entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: WNW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow or ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
